CustomField.description: Checks to see if Activity/Subject contains a connected call disposition and returns TRUE if it does.
CustomField.formula: IF( Activity_Type_OS__c = "Call Out" && OR( CONTAINS(Subject,"Call- Connect"), CONTAINS(Subject,"Call- Qualification"), CONTAINS(Subject,"Call- Discovery"), CONTAINS(Subject,"Call- Demo"), CONTAINS(Subject,"Call- Qual+Disco"), CONTAINS(Subject,"Call- Disco+Demo"), CONTAINS(Subject,"Call- Qual+Disco+Demo") ),TRUE,FALSE )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Checks to see if Activity/Subject contains a connected call disposition and returns TRUE if it does.
CustomField.label: Call Connect
